product_name: The North Face WindWall Gloves - Men's
long_description: The all-purpose, lightweight WindWall(R) fleece gloves from The North Face block wind and provide excellent dexterity. WindWall(R) fleece fabric blocks the majority of wind to keep your hands warm on cold days. 5 Dimensional Fit(TM) uses 5 measurements of the hand to construct gloves with an accurate and consistent fit. Reinforced palms and fingers stand up to hard work in the outdoors. Articulated fingers and thumb allow easy grip and dexterity, and reduce hand fatigue.
short_description: The all-purpose, lightweight WindWall(R) fleece gloves from The North Face block wind and provide excellent dexterity.
